verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* take refuge: Save \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1697"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* pursue \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H5921"\w*,

Lest \w they|strong="H3068"\w* tear \w my|strong="H3605"\w* soul \w like|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion, Rending \w it|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* pieces, while \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* God, \w if|strong="H6435"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H5337"\w* done this; \w If|strong="H6435"\w* there \w be|strong="H5315"\w* iniquity \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* hands;

\w If|strong="H3426"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* rewarded \w evil|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w peace|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* (Yea, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w without|strong="H6213"\w* \w cause|strong="H6213"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* mine adversary);

Let \w the|strong="H7999"\w* \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w* pursue \w my|strong="H7999"\w* soul, \w and|strong="H7451"\w* overtake \w it|strong="H7999"\w*; Yea, let \w him|strong="H1580"\w* tread \w my|strong="H7999"\w* life down \w to|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* earth, \w And|strong="H7451"\w* lay \w my|strong="H7999"\w* glory \w in|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H7999"\w* dust. \qs Selah\qs*

Arise, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w in|strong="H7931"\w* thine anger; Lift \w up|strong="H7931"\w* \w thyself|strong="H5315"\w* against \w the|strong="H7291"\w* rage \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w mine|strong="H7291"\w* adversaries, \w And|strong="H5315"\w* awake \w for|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*; \w thou|strong="H7291"\w* hast commanded judgment.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* let \w the|strong="H5375"\w* congregation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* peoples compass \w thee|strong="H6680"\w* \w about|strong="H5375"\w*; \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6680"\w* return thou \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* ministereth judgment \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w peoples|strong="H3816"\w*: Judge \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* righteousness, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w mine|strong="H7725"\w* integrity \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H4791"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w*.

Oh let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wickedness \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wicked \w come|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H3068"\w* end, \w but|strong="H5971"\w* establish thou \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w*: \w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6664"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* trieth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* minds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hearts.

\w My|strong="H3559"\w* shield \w is|strong="H7563"\w* \w with|strong="H6662"\w* God, \w Who|strong="H6662"\w* saveth \w the|strong="H3559"\w* upright \w in|strong="H6662"\w* \w heart|strong="H3826"\w*.
God \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w righteous|strong="H3477"\w* judge, Yea, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w that|strong="H3820"\w* \w hath|strong="H3820"\w* indignation every day.

If \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H6662"\w* turn not, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H6662"\w* whet \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sword; \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w hath|strong="H6662"\w* bent \w his|strong="H3605"\w* bow, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H3117"\w* ready;

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H2719"\w* also \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H2719"\w* death; \w He|strong="H3808"\w* maketh \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w arrows|strong="H7198"\w* fiery \add shafts\add*.

Behold, \w he|strong="H4194"\w* travaileth \w with|strong="H3627"\w* iniquity; Yea, \w he|strong="H4194"\w* hath conceived mischief, \w and|strong="H3627"\w* brought \w forth|strong="H3559"\w* falsehood.

\w He|strong="H2009"\w* hath made \w a|strong="H3068"\w* pit, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* dug \w it|strong="H2009"\w*, \w And|strong="H2029"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* fallen into \w the|strong="H3205"\w* ditch which \w he|strong="H2009"\w* made.

\w His|strong="H6466"\w* mischief \w shall|strong="H7845"\w* return \w upon|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* own \w head|strong="H5307"\w*, \w And|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* violence \w shall|strong="H7845"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w upon|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H6466"\w* own pate.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* thanks \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness, \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* sing praise \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* Most \w High|strong="H7218"\w*.
